translation.welcomeParagraph: A unique online community that connects people in a new, more humane, and fairer way. A community that promotes togetherness, synergistic creation, and a more equitable distribution of profits.
translation.contactPopupIntro: Thank you for your interest in our investment packages and the benefits they include. If you are interested in making a larger investment, please fill out the contact form with your full name, email address, and phone number. Upon receiving your request, you will be contacted to arrange a potential meeting with the company owners (method, time, place).
translation.starterPopup.title: Information about Starter Packages
translation.starterPopup.unavailable: At this stage of business operations, the option to purchase a starter package is not available.
translation.starterPopup.betterOption: If you are interested in our business offer and wish to become an SFfranchisee, at this stage you have the opportunity to invest in an Investment Package, which is a better and more profitable option for you compared to the starter packages.
translation.chooseInvestorType.title: Decision on Business Continuation and Investment in Investment Packages
translation.chooseInvestorType.p1: If you are a registered user from the old system who wishes to continue business without investment or with an investment in Investment Packages, select “Registered User”.
translation.chooseInvestorType.p2: If you want to start a business in the new system as a new member (SFstarter / SFfranchisee) or want to take the opportunity to invest in Investment Packages as a passive investor, select “New Investor”.
translation.investmentDetails.title: Investment Decision
translation.investmentDetails.howDidYouHear: How did you hear about our business opportunity?
translation.investmentDetails.noReferrer: I do not have a referrer
translation.investmentDetails.selectPackagesTitle: CHOOSE AN INVESTMENT PACKAGE (OR MORE) OR THE INVESTMENT AMOUNT
translation.investmentDetails.totalLabel: I intend to invest a total of:
translation.investmentDetails.noteP1: Upon completion of the Investment Packages website, you will be notified to access it, through which you will make the payment for the selected Investment Package or the amount you wish to invest, along with signing the Investment Agreement.
translation.investmentDetails.noteP2: Business operations will resume with the first filling of the SFalgorithm, about which you will be timely informed via email.
